I'm on the way home right now.
Do you take the bus or subway?
I take both because my house is very far from my office.
How long does it take to get home?
I walk to my office every day.
Walking is good for your health.
By the way, don't you have a car?
I do, but I don't really drive much.
The traffic is terrible in the morning.
Can you avoid the rush hour?
One time, it took me three hours to get to the office!
When do you get up in the morning?
I usually get up at 5:30 am.
I work out in the morning.
That's how you stay so healthy!
